short_summary: Deconstruction of Building 22 at Scott, Saskatchewan Research and Development Centre
description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has issued a Tender Notice for the deconstruction of Building 22 (Seed Cleaning Plant) at Scott, Saskatchewan Research and Development Centre.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Title
Scott, Saskatchewan Research and Development Centre Building 22 (Seed Cleaning Plant) De-Construction

### Tender Information
#### Solicitation Number
465-1-35-C9A

#### Publication Date
2022-11-22

#### Tender Closing Date
2022-12-07T15:00:00

### Contracting Entity Information
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
- **Address**: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0C5, Canada
- **Contact Information**:
  - **Name**: Natalie O'Neill
  - **Email**: natalie.oneill@canada.ca
  - **Phone**: 306-807-8740

### Scope of Work
The tender is for the de-construction of Building 22, an existing Seed Cleaning Plant (approx. 299 square metres), located on the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada property at 7th Street, Highway 374 in Scott, Saskatchewan. The scope of work includes the foundation removal and asbestos abatement. The contractor must adhere to environmentally sustainable practices, diverting at least 90% of construction waste from landfills, in line with the Federal Sustainable Development Strategy.

### Tender Process
The tender is a two-phase selection process.

#### Phase One - Qualifications and Experience
- **Submission Requirements**: Suppliers must submit their Phase One electronic bid in a single PDF file, via email to the specified address.
- **Evaluation Criteria**: The bid will be evaluated based on the information requested in the Phase One solicitation.

#### Phase Two - Pricing
- **Submission Requirements**: Suppliers who pass Phase One will be invited to submit their Phase Two bid.
- **Evaluation Criteria**: The price bid will be evaluated.

### Important Information

- **Bidding Instructions**: Timely and correct delivery of electronic bids is the responsibility of the supplier.
- **Bid Receiving**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier.
- **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Additional Resources

- **Tender Documents**: Available here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/37c70f1f3573ca2d0dde4bebd9c956d9/tender_465-1-35-c9a_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/
